title: LoL patcher is stuck
body: Um so my I was downloading LoL onto my laptop when some wi-fi problem occurred. I fixed it and checked the LoL patcher. It said that was scanning for step 2. I checked again later, I find not only has the download speed fallen but it`s still showing the scanning thing with no files scanned. It`s still downloading but the speed has fallen. What should I do? I also don't want to restart the download because it took me 4 days to reach 50 %.

replies.body:
Hey MugetsuR, 

First and foremost, good god that is a very long time o.o Dedicated player over here ^^^^ Any who I think I may have the prescription your patcher may need, just make sure to follow all the steps. 

Patcher KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

Hope this works out for you, and if you still need help reach out on here :) 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Thanks alot! I found a solution by switching to another zone~
Yeah, I know that`s a long time. Well LoL is worth it
